briefTitle: Safety and Immunogenicity of Meningococcal ACWY Conjugate Versus Polysaccharide Vaccine in Children 2 to 10 Years of Age
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Randomized, Observer-blind, Controlled, Multi-Center Study to Compare the Safety of One Dose of Novartis Meningococcal ACWY Conjugate Vaccine With That of a Licensed Meningococcal ACWY Polysaccharide Vaccine (MenomuneÂ®) Administered to Healthy Children 2 to 10 Years of Age
summary: Safety and immunogenicity of meningococcal ACWY conjugate versus polysaccharide vaccine in children 2 to 10 years of age

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Subjects With hSBA Seroresponse Against Serogroups A, C, W and Y One Month After Vaccination With MenACWY-CRM or MenACWY-PS
